CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1997 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1997 Code, as supplemented through April 5, 2009, that are included herein. Sections of the 1997 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
1997 Code
Section Section

this Code
